pages.text: Waystones are infused with ender-energy, making them able to store locations.$(br2)This, in turn, allows them to redirect $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$(), casting them in a different place.$(br2)To redirect a $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$(), use the Waystone on the $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals#chalk)Golden Chalk$() after the $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$() has been started.
